attributes.additional_details:
After a very close referendum for the exit of the EU it is clear that the country is divided over what is best for the UK and our future.
After David Cameron's resignation, and suspected election fraud the Conservative Party no longer what was electived in May 2015.
I am writing this to give the people a choice of which government should lead our country through these hard times.
attributes.background:
As the general public have voted to leave the EU the public deserve to vote for which party they want to lead us during these uncertain times. 
Each party should have the chance to put a new manifesto of how to manage the direction of the UK as we navigate leaving Europe.
